location.address: Computer Deconstruction Lab, Building 9059, 2201 Marconi Road, Wall Township, N.J. 07719, USA

ext_weather.name: Tonight
ext_weather.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 4am, then patchy fog and a slight chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 72. South wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
